You can get a refund if you have a 7 Day or longer Travelcard or Bus & Tram Pass.
We will ask you to send us details of your illness and when it started. This could be a:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Medical certificate","Letter on headed paper from your doctor or employer"]}
If your illness started less than 6 weeks ago , we'll refund you from the start of your illness.
If your illness started more than 6 weeks ago , your refund will be calculated as 6 weeks from the date of your application.
If you want to claim a refund, you cannot use the ticket again. You will not get a refund if you use the ticket after claiming.
We charge a Â£5 admin fee for this refund.
Please fill in the Oyster form , and provide us with:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Details of your illness and when it started","A medical certificate or letter on headed paper from your doctor or employer","Your contact details (name, address and phone number)"]}
